description:
T1Ash rear left
To contain crown spread and routine  maintenance, suggest: reduce regrowth back  to previous reduction points (approx. 1-1.5m  regrowth), remove ivy to crown break and trim  remaining ivy on trunk to tidy. Existing height 9.5m, finished height approx. 7.5m, Existing spread approx. 8.5m, finished spread approx. 6.5m
T2 Fig rear right 
Reduce back to previous reduction points  approx. 2m regrowth - Existing height 5-6m, finished height approx. 3-4m, Existing spread approx. 3m, finished spread approx. 2m
decision_conditions: For T2 - The specification is not suitable and therefore needs to be confirmed. The specification needs to be measurable and quantifiable so that we can understand the amount that is to be removed in meters. We need to know the amount to be removed and the remaining crown size. E.g. 2m crown reduction in width and 2m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 3m and height of 5m
